in.ac.iitb.cfilt.jhwnl.data
Class Pointer

java.lang.Object
  in.ac.iitb.cfilt.jhwnl.data.Pointer
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Pointer
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

A Pointer encodes a lexical or semantic relationship between WordNet entities. A lexical relationship holds between Words; a semantic relationship holds between Synsets. Relationships are directional: the two roles of a relationship are the source and target. Relationships are typed: the type of a relationship is a PointerType, and can be retrieved via getType.

See Also:

Constructor Detail

Pointer

public Pointer(PointerTarget source,
               int index,
               PointerType pointerType,
               POS targetPOS,
               long targetOffset,
               int targetIndex,
               long srcOffset)
Constructor for relations other than gradation and ontology nodes.

Parameters:
source - Source synset of type PointerTarget
index - index of the source synset.
pointerType - PointerType is the type of relation.
targetPOS - POS of the target synset.
targetOffset - offset of the word in the data_txt file
targetIndex - index of the target word

getTargetOffset

public long getTargetOffset()
Get the offset of the target within the target synset

Returns:

getTargetOffset1

public long getTargetOffset1()
This method is for the gradation relation. Get the offset of the Post-intermediate target within the target synset.

Returns:
offset of the Post-Intermediate target from within the synset data string.
